verbs.description: [ARG0: spurs] [V: lose] [ARG1: derrick white to heel injury derrick white] became the third spurs guard to hit the injured list in the past seven games going on the shelf with a torn ligament in his heel tim duncan parker bryn forbes san antonio spurs lonnie walker iv orlando leonard spurs point guard dejounte murray orlando florida derrick white gregg popovich injury robinson spurs
